"Angels of Fire": "Rescue the victims surrounded by fire!"
"Rescue the victims surrounded by fire!"
"Scattered around the city are people awaiting rescue! Please help them immediately!"
"/face2 All people in need of assistance have been successfully rescued. Good job!"
"This is dangerous! The risk is high, but I'm forcing the transfer of all the people left!"
"I've checked the position of the people in need of rescue and have displayed them in your map. Please, rescue them immediately!"
"Once the fire has been extinguished completely, ensure the safety of the people personally to complete the transfer."
"Coordinates checked. Transfer: Successful! Keep going!"

"We've found more people. If you
don't put out the fires, the transfer may fail. Extinguish those fires!"
"I've confirmed the existence of more people in need of assistance. Please, help them all!"
"Rescuers, this is a risky situation! Please, hurry up!"
"The victims vital signs are reaching critical levels! Please rescue them at once!"
"The fires have been extinguished. Ensure the safety of the victims and send us their coordinates."
"There's people in need of assistance all across the city areas. Please perform an emergency rescue."
"The transfer of all the people has been confirmed. Well done."
"There's still some people left. The risk is very high, but I will have to force their transfer."
"I've checked the position of people who need help and marked them in your minimap. Hurry."
"The exact coordinates of the people are extremely important to ensure a safe transfer. Check on them personally after you're done with the fire."
"The coordinates have been sent, the transfer is complete. Keep going."
"Victim found. Put out the fire to eliminate the transfer risk. Once it's done, continue."
"We have locations for newfound victims. Hurry to their rescue!"
"Time is running out. Rescue as many people as possible!"
"If this keeps on, it's going to get dangerous. Hurry!"
"The fires have been put out, safe transfer is now possible. Check on the people and send us their exact coordinates."
"All around the city, there are a lot of people that have failed to escape! Proceed with the rescue, please!"
"/face2 All victims have been rescued! Good job!"
"/face4 You did your best... Even though it's dangerous, I'll force the transfer of the remaining people!"
"I've found more people that couldn't escape! Look at your minimap, please!"
"To ensure the transfer of the victims, we need their exact coordinates. Please check on them yourself after the fire is gone!"
"/face2 The coordinates are confirmed. The transfer is complete! Please continue with your mission!"

"It's too risky to transport
them while they're surrounded by
flames! Extinguish the fires first!"
"W-What?! More victims are appearing everywhere! Please, give them the help they need!"
"Hurry! Please hurry!"

"/face4 Almost out of time!
Faster! Faster!"
"/face2 The fire is extinguished! Check on the victims and send me their coordinates, please."
